title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, June 20, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of writer and activist Charles Waddell Chesnutt (1858), the first black fiction writer to have his work published in The Atlantic magazine.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of writer and activist Charles Waddell Chesnutt (1858), the first black fiction writer to have his work published in The Atlantic magazine.
